Module com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1
Package com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.ball

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.ball.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RainbowBall, RubberBall
public abstract class Ball extends Object
Abstract class representing the most important aspects of a Ball, leaving only the implementation of making a ball to the class that extends it.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(Point2D center, int radius, Color innerColor, Color borderColor)
      Parameters:
      center - Center of the new ball
      radius - Radius of the new ball
      innerColor - Inner color that will fill the new ball
      borderColor - Border color that will be on the outside of the ball
